object.Potat.name: Sweet Potato
object.Potat.description: A wildly popular vegeatable. The sweet taste compliments any dish.
object.PotatSeeds.name: Sweet Potato Seeds
object.PotatSeeds.description: Plant in Spring or Summer for a lovely purple veggie. Takes 5 days to mature.
